metadata.name: Serenade of Night: A Symphony of Darkness & Light
metadata.description:
Portrays the beauty and serenity of the night, blended with the interplay of light and shadow, forming a work of art in the form of a symphony.  reflects how the night can emit a unique and impressive beauty, which can be considered as a symphony of darkness and light as a whole. Moreover, the woman can also be interpreted as a metaphorical representation of human life, which consists of moments of darkness and light, and how these moments together form a beautiful life story.

PenyukataÂ©2023
